translations: 用花环装饰；将……做成花环；包围；覆盖
缭绕；成圈状；扭曲；环绕盘旋

sentences.sentence: The postures of these dragons have different characteristics during various ages. Some dragons curve and wreathe, some curvet through the clouds, some march forward leisurely and some are poised.
sentences.translation: 这些龙的姿态各具时代特色，有的曲体盘绕，有的穿云腾越，有的信步前行，有的蓄力待发。
